title: $:/temp/RemoteAssetInfo/https://tiddlywiki.com/library/v5.1.22/index.html/$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-x-tiddlywiki
creator: jack
description: Tiddlywiki Classic highlighting mode for CodeMirror
name: CodeMirror Mode TiddlyWiki Classic
readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for ~TiddlyWiki Classic tiddlers (text/x-tiddlywiki) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
